Title: Vector Visualizer - Silverlight tool for visualizing lines in 3D
Description: Vector Visualizer - Silverlight tool for visualizing lines in 3D
HomeWiki:
Vector Visualizer - Silverlight tool for visualizing lines in 3D

Includes a simple 3D engine for drawing lines in three dimensions.

Demo: http://www.bodurov.com/VectorVisualizer/

Tools developed on the base of Vector Visualizer:

Nearest Stars in 3D: http://www.bodurov.com/NearestStars/

Colors Map in 3D: http://www.bodurov.com/ColorMapVisualizer/

Offline Executable: http://www.bodurov.com/files/VectorVisualizer_Offline.zip

Article: http://www.simple-talk.com/dotnet/.net-framework/building-a-simple-3d-engine-with-silverlight/

Blog Entry: http://blog.bodurov.com/Vector-Visualizer-3D-tool-for-viewing-vectors-in-three-dimensions
